---
title: "Simulated data for US Male Height"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

Based on:

 US Dept. of Health and Human Services; et al. (August 2016). "Anthropometric Reference Data for Children and Adults: United States, 2011â€“2014" (PDF). National Health Statistics Reports. 11. https://www.cdc.gov/nchs/data/series/sr_03/sr03_039.pdf


```{r}
# male mean height and sd in centimeters
male.mean.ht <- 175.7
se.mean <- 0.21
sample.sz <- 5232
sd.ht <- sqrt(sample.sz) * se.mean
```

```{r}
set.seed(20171112)
ht.data <- data_frame(height = rnorm(25000, mean = male.mean.ht, sd = sd.ht))
```

```{r}
write_csv(ht.data, "simulated-US-male-height.csv")
```
